errorMessage.packet.been.sent.out:
Sorry,
 all bags have been sent out!
treasure.directSubBetRequirement: {{value}}% bet amount in Crypto games from level 1 friends。
referAndEarn.description: Invite friends to bring you Continuous Commission!
referAndEarn.description2: Get commission on the bets from all your team member who are lv 1 to lv 2.
referAndEarn.description3: Bet amount are defined as valid bets in crypto games (Mines, Crash).Valid bets will only be calculated for bets that have been settled and produced a win or loss result. Any games played, tied, or canceled will not be counted in valid bets.
rule.referralTeam.description: Only when your friends registered and owned over {{value}} KATON in their wallet are counted valid member. Your team members can create a lv 1 to lv 2 Referral Team for you. The more members they bring in your team, the greater your income will be.
teamRatingSystem.description: There are five rating levels from 1 star to 5 star. Every referral team starts from 1 rating star, and you can upgrade your team rating through completing assignments. The higher rating your team is, the more rewards your team get.
eggRule.title: Rules of Smash Egg
eggRule.heading: Welcome to Smash Egg. Consume the hammer to get the big prize. Depending on the type of egg, the rewards and the required hammer for each smash are different:
eggRule.hint: You can get {{amount}} USDT after egg is broken.
eggRule.noticeContens: You have to smash the egg continuously until the egg is broken. If you give up halfway, the consumed hammer will not be returned.
eggGiveUp.desc1: If you give up smashing the egg, the hammer you have consumed will not be returned.
eggGiveUp.desc2: Are you sure you want to give up?
CurrencyConversion.Description: Your KATON coins will be converted to USDT for gaming.
rank.rules.crypto.title: Crypto Rank Rule
rank.rules.crypto.content1.subTitle: Valid bet
rank.rules.crypto.content1.content: The ranking is based on how much you bet in crypto games (Mines, Crash). Valid bets will only be calculated for bets that have been settled and produced a win or loss result. Any games played, tied, or canceled will not be counted in valid bets.
rank.rules.crypto.content2.subTitle: Update time
rank.rules.crypto.content2.content: Ranking list is updated once an hour.
rank.rules.crypto.content3.subTitle: End time
rank.rules.crypto.content4.subTitle: Daily
rank.rules.crypto.content5.subTitle: Weekly
rank.rules.crypto.content6.subTitle: Monthly
rank.rules.crypto.content7.subTitle: Ranking rewards
rank.rules.crypto.content7.content: Rewards will be distributed automatically in 2 hour after the final result of ranking come out.
rank.rules.share.title: Share Rank Rule
rank.rules.share.content1.subTitle: Valid friends
rank.rules.share.content1.content: Share Rank is a competition for who can invite more friends to join Katon. The ranking is according how many friends you invite become valid members. Once your friends have more than 100 KATON in their wallet, they are the valid friend.
rank.rules.share.content2.subTitle: Update time
rank.rules.share.content2.content: Ranking list is updated once an hour.
rank.rules.share.content3.subTitle: End time
rank.rules.share.content4.subTitle: Daily
rank.rules.share.content5.subTitle: Ranking rewards
rank.rules.share.content5.content: Rewards will be distributed automatically in 2 hour after the final result of ranking come out.
Name: Name
JoinMyTeamToPlayTheGameAndEarnKATONCoin: Join my team to play the game and earn KATON coin.
TeamStarRating.Description: The star rating will be upgraded based on betting amount of your team. Higher star rating lead to higher commission percentages.
TotalBets.Description: Bet amount are defined as valid bets in crypto games (Mines, Crash).Valid bets will only be calculated for bets that have been settled and produced a win or loss result. Any games played, tied, or canceled will not be counted in valid bets.
CommissionDetails.Description: Only the past 30 days are displayed. Commissions are automatically credited to your wallet every hour.
AllMembers.Description: Only when your friends registered and owned over {{value}} KATON in their wallet are counted valid member.
VerificationCheckMail: The verification code has sent, please check your mailbox.
InputSameEmailError: Please don’t enter the same email as current email
InputPasswordConfirmNoMatchError: The password confirmation does not match
LuckyMoneyDescription:
Invite your friends 
with Lucky Money!
LuckyMoneyListEmpty:
Empty. 
Share New Bags to invite friends to join Katon!
StopSharingDescription:
The unused budget will be refunded in an hour. 
Are you sure to terminate sending lucky bags?
SystemMaintenanceContent: Katon is temporarily unavailable due to system maintenance. We will be restoring regular service as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience.
DepositedSuccessfullyContent: It may takes a few minutes to effect on your account.
AreYouSureYouWantToDisconnectThisAddress: Are you sure you want to disconnect this address?
DepositAddressHint:
Please be sure to enter the 
<Comp>correct address</Comp> and
<Comp>Comment</Comp> when depositing. Currently only
<Comp>TON</Comp> and
<Comp>USDT</Comp> in
<Comp>TON blockchain</Comp> format are supported.
SubmittedSuccessfullyContent: It may takes some time to process your withdrawal. You can go to History to check the status.
WithdrawDeniedMessage: You have to enter your fund password for withdrawal. Please go to add your email and set your fund password.
YouHaveReachedTheLimitOfDailyWithdrawal: You have reached the limit of daily withdrawal.
MemoOptionalHint: Most trading platforms require you to fill in plain text MEMO or digital or comment for TON deposit before it can be credited. Failure to fill in or incorrect filling will result in asset loss.
GetTreasureFromTaskReward: Get the treasure from the reward of task.
ThereIsNoTreasureToUnlock: There is no treasure to unlock.
task.depositDescription: The deposit amount will be calculated based on the current exchange rate of USDT.
task.inviteFriendsDescription: Only when your friends registered and owned over 100 KATON in their wallet are counted valid member.
BuyEnergyDescription: Consume 1 energy for each game.You have ran out of Energy.
BuyEnergyDescription2: Would you like to get one more energy to play the game?
GoToRechargeDescription: Insufficient balance in your KATON wallet. Go to get more KATON.
luckyMoneyKindFixed: The amount in each bag and total bag quantity is <Comp>fixed</Comp>.
luckyMoneyKindRandom: The amount in each bag and total bag quantity is <Comp>random</Comp>.
luckyMoneyHint: Only unregistered friends can get the lucky money and become your potential referral member.
MaintenanceDescription: Katon is temporarily unavailable due to system maintenance. We will be restoring regular service as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience.
task.teamClassRewardDescription: The reward depends on your team rating when you access Katon.
